title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps outlined in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file called test.xml
3. The scripted resource editor example should be used as the default editor for XML files
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With...'
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'
7. Observe that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active
EB: When selecting 'Open With...' and choosing 'Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open with a different type of editor, a new text editor should be opened for that file.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file called test.xml
3. Select test.xml in the Navigator
4. Choose 'Open With...'
5. Select a different type of editor than the one currently in use
6. Observe if a new editor is opened for the file
